title: The site won't let me return. Gift return only
content: I need to get my money back for my Best secure purchase. The appropriet internet speed is not available where I live. After getting order then viewing item it doesn't give me an option to return. Only return gift. This is not a gift. I want my money back on my credit card now before the 14 days is up and a can't have even the option to return. I have a brain injury and this whole situation is extremely frustrating ðŸ˜¡
